Hello! I'm a data scientist and bioinformatician at [UCB](https://ucb.com), a multinational biopharmaceutical company. I have strong experience in multiomics data analysis applied to therapeutic research. I mainly rely on the [R programming language](https://www.r-project.org/) for which I have developed several libraries.

Coming from [Montpellier](https://www.google.com/maps/place/Montpellier), where I studied biochemistry, I've lived in Belgium for more than 20 years, in the [*pays de Charleroi*](https://www.google.com/maps/place/Pays+Noir). After my [PhD](https://difusion.ulb.ac.be/vufind/Record/ULB-DIPOT:oai:dipot.ulb.ac.be:2013/210856/TOC) at the [ULB (Universit√© Libre de Bruxelles)](https://www.ulb.be/), during which I studied computer science, data science and bioinformatics, and a postdoc at the [University of Namur](https://www.unamur.be/), I moved to the biotech industry focusing on pharmaceutical and medical applications.
